task.title: Tryout QueueMetrics Live Integration
task.shortdesc: After you apply an ID of QueueMetrics Live, you can try the integration of Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX and the Queue Metrics Live.

step.cmd: Log in the PBX web interface, go to QueueMetrics Integration.
Check the option Enable QueueMetrics Live Integration.
Choose call center type to QueueMetrics Live.
Enter your demo ID and password.
Click Visit to visit the login page of QueueMetrics.

info.note: If the web page is not opened, copy the link and paste it in your web browser to visit it.

step.cmd: On the login page of QueueMetrics, enter the user name and password, click Log in.

ul.li:
Login: Enter demoadmin
Do not enter your QueueMetrics ID.
Password: Enter the password of your QueueMetrics ID.
